Прохожу эту игру уже в четвёртый раз, первый раз сложив пиратский флаг. Теперь синглплеер проходится за один день, раньше я мог растянуть прохождение на неделю или больше. Но даже сейчас механика порталов выглядит необычно и по-новому.

Portal 2 ups the ante in every regard, it's funnier, more challenging, looks better and plays better. It's in every respect, the perfect sequel. with Half-Life Alyx being real and not something we all collectively imagined after suffering from Valve withdrawals, I like to believe the chance of a Portal 3 is in the cards because I like these characters far too much to end here, GLaDOS returns and it thrice as funny and sadistic, Wheatley is the best sidekick ever and Stephen Merchant delivers all his lines with the comical timing of the God of Comedy, and Chell is... well Chell, but the companion cubes are back. 

Portal 2 is without a doubt one of the best games ever made, it's fun, funny, challenging and not too long or too short, it's skyrocketed to my top 5 games of all time.

This is one of my favourite games ever. The PORTAL series is absolutely amazing. If you are thinking about buying you definitely  should and if you have played PORTAL 1 than this is a guaranteed good choice.
